description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ae952","text":"Protocol for performing an immunofluorescence assay with fixed HeLa cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4rnpt","text":"Seed cells in 6 well plate wells containing HistoGrip (ThermoFisher) coated coverslips in standard growth media, aiming for a confluency of ~70-80% at the time of treatment the next day.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fa9h1","text":"Feed cells for   prior to treatment with the desired growth compounds in standard growth media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c12qs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7i8ot","text":"At the conclusion of the treatment, aspirate all media from the well and replace with  /well of fixative (  paraformaldehyde in   phosphate buffer). Incubate for   gently rocking at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":86,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":106,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":128,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":162,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":182,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8nfur","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"4","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":206}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":21}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"4":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4gkg3","text":"Remove the fixative, and replace with  /well of permeabilization buffer (  Triton X-100 in PBS). Incubate for   gently rocking at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":73,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":110,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":130,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eebdi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":206}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"g90d","text":"Aspirate the permeabilization buffer, and replace with  /well of blocking buffer ( goat serum in   Triton X-100 in PBS). Incubate for   gently rocking at  . {"blocks":[{"key":"ec1cc","text":"During step 4, make up the primary antibody solutions containing the desired antibodies in blocking buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9og8c","text":"Aspirate the blocking buffer, and wash each well 3x with PBS. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fpvoo","text":"Wash each well once with blocking buffer, and when aspirating the blocking buffer, gently nudge the coverslip into the center of the well. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"12ko2","text":"Using a p200 pipette, carefully add   of the primary antibody solution directly onto the cover slip of each well. Ensure the bench this is performed on is flat. Replace the lid on each plate and cover all plates from light.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9ko6g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"83i7","text":"Incubate samples in the primary antibody solution for   at   (static, no rocking). During this incubation, make up the secondary antibody solutions containing the desired antibodies in blocking buffer. Cover this solution to protect it from light until it is needed.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":54,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":59,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ccfu7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"90iur","text":"Wash each well once with blocking buffer, and when aspirating the blocking buffer, gently nudge the coverslip into the center of the well. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9mgra","text":"Using a p200 pipette, carefully add   of the secondary antibody solution directly onto the cover slip of each well. Ensure the bench this is performed on is flat. Replace the lid of each plate and cover all plates from light.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1mfob","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9f20j","text":"Incubate samples in the secondary antibody solution for   at   (static, no rocking). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":56,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cumd7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a0go2","text":"Add PBS to each well to keep the coverslips hydrated prior to mounting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7v6vp","text":"Mount coverslips onto glass slides using a small amount of TRIS-buffered DABCO-glycerol mounting medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8vid3","text":"Seal the edges of each coverslip with black nail polish, and once dry, store slides protected from light at   until imaging. title: Immunofluorescence Assay (IFA)
